org.xbmc.android.remote.business

Class MemCacheThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.xbmc.android.remote.business.AbstractThread
        • org.xbmc.android.remote.business.MemCacheThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

     class MemCacheThread
extends AbstractThread
    This thread asynchronously delivers memory-cached bitmaps. The memory cache keeps small-size thumb bitmaps in a soft-referenced list. This thread is directly accessed by the original HttpApi thread, through one of its wrappers.
    Author:
    Team XBMC
